title: move to jpn server /only RP?
body:
i stay in JPN and i miss free move server to JPN .
no solution for free?? i cant purchase RP T.T becuz i dont hav visa or master credit card and i m not stay in oce ,so i cant buy RP card in 7/11
many japanese dont know ,open they got own server ..... also i am
pls give me answer .... i m so sad ....
i love League of legends 
i never play like this game in my life .... i was played start S2~untill now .....pls T.T

replies.body:
こんにちは

私はあなたのためのいくつかの顧客サポートの専門家と話をしていたし、私たちはあなたの問題への解決策を持っていると思います。

ここであなたがする必要があるものです：

1. あなたは日本のサーバー用のRPカードを購入します。
2. そうしたらこのリンクを通してリオットゲームズ サポートに連絡してください。https://support.riotgames.com/hc/ja/requests/new
3. あなたの日本のRPカードをオセアニアのRPカードに変えてもらえるようリオットゲームズ サポートに頼んでください。
4. 日本のサーバーにアカウントを転送するために、あなたの新しいオセアニアRPカードを使用してください。

私はこのことができます願っています!

I thought you might find Japanese easier to understand than English, so I got a good friend to translate that for me. But if you have any more questions, you'll have to write them in English for me so that I can reply :D

I'm sorry but google translate always makes these sorts of things entertaining.

>Hello

>I have had a talk with experts of some of the customer support for you , I think we have a solution to your problem .

>Here is what you need to do :

>You will buy the RP card for the Japanese server .
Soshitara please contact Li husband Games supported through this link .
Please ask to re husband Games support to get to change your Japanese RP card in Oceania RP card .
In order to transfer the account to Japan of the server , please use your new Oceania RP card .
I hope this helps

Contact Li Husband games, Rito games has things to answer for now.
lol I saw that, I have full faith in my school's transfer student though XD
